description: This file contains smoke tests for the backend API endpoints of the career path navigator project, verifying responses and data integrity across core endpoints such as datasets, roles, competencies, adjacency, resources, and recommendations.

methods.name: str _get_base_url()
methods.description: Determines the base URL for API requests, either from environment variable or defaults to localhost.

methods.name: t.Tuple[int,t.Any] _check_get(session: requests.Session, path: str, expect_nonempty: bool = False)
methods.description: Helper function to send a GET request to an endpoint, validate response status and JSON payload, and optionally check for non-empty data.

methods.name: test_health_and_datasets_and_recommendations_endpoints_smoke()
methods.description: Main smoke test function executing various GET requests to validate key API endpoints respond correctly and return expected data.

ctags.name: _check_get
ctags.pattern: /^def _check_get(session: requests.Session, path: str, expect_nonempty: bool = False) -> t.Tuple[i/
ctags.signature: (session: requests.Session, path: str, expect_nonempty: bool = False)
